name: Heiwa
description:
Heiwa (Hey-Waa) which means "Peace" in Japanese is a game based on the idea of being in a peaceful Japanese garden and being able to study the details of what it contains.

Controls:

WASD  - Movement

E - Pickup Book / Enter Hammock

F - Drop Book

Space - Exit Hammock

Mouse  - Camera Look

' [ ' and ' ] ' - Switch pages in the book

*This is an early release to an ongoing project.
